nodes.text: A stasis field was a device used for preservation. It worked by altering the passage of time within the area subject to the field; usually either by slowing the passage of time, or stopping it all together. The corpse of Jedi Master Luminara Unduli was stored in a stasis field in the Spire on Stygeon Prime.
Stasis fields could also be used to preserve living organisms, such as flowered plants.
